description: This file is a Java source file defining a REST controller named AnalyticsController. It provides several API endpoints related to analytics for Black Friday trends, retailer behaviors, and savings summaries, interacting with the AnalyticsService.

classes.name: AnalyticsController
classes.description: REST controller providing analytics endpoints for Black Friday trends, retailer behaviors, and savings summaries.

methods.name: bf
methods.description: Retrieves aggregated Black Friday trend metrics via the AnalyticsService.

methods.name: rb
methods.description: Retrieves retailer behavior insights via the AnalyticsService.

methods.name: summary
methods.description: Provides a savings summary for the current authenticated user via the AnalyticsService.
